author: travelandtourworld.com
title: Family Celebrations for Eid Al Adha with Four Seasons hotel cairo at the first residenceTravelandtourworld.com
text:
Family Celebrations for Eid Al Adha with Four Seasons hotel cairo at the first residence
This Eid, celebrate Eid Al Adha with family and friends at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence. The luxury Cairo hotel is extending special Eid offers and packages to ensure a memorable vacation filled with relaxation, culinary delights, plenty of fun and excitement.
The Eid Brunch buffet in La Gourmandise features a great variety of festive dishes and myriad international cuisines from 1:00 to 7:00 pm on the second, third and fourth days of the Eid celebrations. Live cooking stations including Arabic, Thai, Italian and seafood stations, where guests can enjoy the restaurant’s lively atmosphere and pamper their taste buds while a live band serenades guests throughout the day. Indulge in complete peace of mind while children spoil themselves with fun face painting and much more in the dedicated Kids Corner.
Alternatively choose to dine in Aura on the pool deck, serving the best of Lebanese restaurant in Cairo, or STRADA restaurant serving mouth watering and delicious Italian cuisine coupled with flawless Four Seasons service.
Spend Eid in the comfort and luxurious accommodations of Four Seasons Hotel Hotel Cairo at The First Residence by enjoying the Hotel’s special rooms package starting from EGP 2,300* based on bed and breakfast, which includes parking, complimentary standard internet access and all applicable taxes.
Kick back and enjoy quality leisure time at Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence, rejuvenate and relax in the Hotel’s Spa and Wellness Centre, a luxury spa in Cairo, book a massage and take a dip in the outdoor heated pool. And if retail therapy is needed, the Hotel Lobby leads into the upscale, three-level First Mall, home to Cairo’s most luxurious boutiques.
Source:-Four Seasons
